item.title: Woman killed in suspected mountain lion attack while hiking in northern Colorado
item.description: A woman was killed in a suspected mountain lion attack while she was hiking alone in the mountains of northern Colorado

item.title: Rain soaks Rose Parade in California and snow squalls hit Midwest and Northeast on first day of 2026
item.description: Rained poured down on the iconic Rose Parade for the first time in 20 years
